alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 11:47AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central San Juan County through 1215 PM MDT... At 1147 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Blanding, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastland. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 58 and 62, and between mile markers 64 and 65. U.S. Highway 491 in Utah between mile markers 9 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Southeast Utah
